key_mistakes.reason: Played too early, losing the opportunity to develop other pieces and exert pressure on central squares.
Placed the knight in a vulnerable position, allowing it to be easily attacked and captured.
Misplaced the rook, allowing the opponent to create threats and improve their position.
Weakened the pawn structure and exposed the king to potential attacks.
Placed the king on a vulnerable square, making it susceptible to potential threats.

recommendations: Focus on developing pieces actively and controlling the center.
Avoid premature aggression that leaves pieces uncoordinated and vulnerable.
Pay attention to pawn structure to avoid creating weaknesses.
Ensure that the king is safe before launching attacks.
